title: [HOLD for payment 2024-10-11] [$250] Saved search - Unable to delete saved search using Enter key
issue_repo_steps:
Action performed: 1. Go to staging.new.expensify.com
2. Go to Search.
3. Click 3-dot menu next to the saved search (save a search if there is no any).
4. Click Delete.
5. Press keyboard Enter.

Expected result: User should be able to delete saved search using Enter key.

Actual result: None
html_description:
